title: Kanamori-San, The Widowed Elf
alternative_title: Miboujin Elf no Kanamori-san; ; 未亡人エルフの金森さん
status: Miboujin Elf no Kanamori-san; ; 未亡人エルフの金森さん
description:
Description :
        When he consoles Mrs. Kanamori, a beautiful elf whose husband has passed away, by saying "I'll marry you myself," he is taken in and becomes her fiance...? A sweet and precious pure love comedy between a clumsy Yankee boy and the slightly natural Kanamori-san, 500 years apart.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 3: Yankee-Kun Is Actually Studying Seriously Today!
Vol.1 Chapter 2: Let's Go On Our First Date!
